package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: BIND Domain Name Server utils
package-manager.description: Bind-utils contains a collection of utilities for querying DNS (Domain Name System) name servers to find out information about Internet hosts. These utils will provide you with the IP addresses for given host names, as well as other information about registered domains and network addresses.

item.para: Update source from 9.8.1 to 9.8.1-P1 to address the following security vulnerability:

CVE-2011-4313 (http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2011-4313): BIND incorrectly handled certain specially crafted packets allowing a remote attacker could to use this flaw to cause a crash, resulting in a denial of service.

CVE-2012-1033 (http://cve.mit re.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2012-1033): The resolver in ISC BIND overwrites cached server names and TTL values in NS records during the processing of a response to an A record query, which allows remote attackers to trigger continued resolvability of revoked domain names via a "ghost domain names" attack.

CVE-2012-1667 (http://cve.mit re.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2012-1667): ISC BIND does not properly handle resource records with a zero-length RDATA section, which allows remote DNS servers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash or data corruption) or obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted record.
